name: Outlands Invaders
description:
Invaders from outer space are getting close to our planet. A squad was sent to intercept the invasion force  but only you and Admiral Slackbar survived their first attack. Defeat the remaining invaders and escape the planet!

This is a 3D On Rails Shooter. It is only a "demo" version, later I might come back and put a little more effort on this.

PS: PLAY FULLSCREEN! The game was initially not meant to play on a browser. Fullscreen at least makes it look better.
